title: Bonus Episode # 9 – "Blind Ambition" – Scary Stories Told in the Dark
description:
In this bonus episode of Scary Stories Told in the Dark, we bring you two terrifying tales from authors Max Rosa and L. Chan performed by host and narrator Otis Jiry, about paranormal perceptions and diabolical doorways.








Learn more about your ad choices. Visit podcastchoices.com/adchoices
